text:
- [Narrator] The world
and how you interact
with it is constantly evolving.

Your organization helps people
adapt to this new reality

with services that rely
more on virtual processes.

Access to online resources
from gaming and shopping

to virtual education and loan
approvals requires seamless

and secure identity verification
and onboarding services.
Using Amazon ReKognition, you can easily

implement identity verification
solutions that are powered

by computer vision
technology into your company.

All without needing any
machine learning expertise.

People can access your
services online more securely
with stronger verification capabilities

that eliminate the need
for physical interactions.

You can verify users in
seconds from anywhere
in the world and scale from hundreds

to millions of identity
verifications per hour

ultimately helping you to
grow your user base faster.

It enables you to detect
fraudulent or duplicate accounts
by complimenting password authentication
with visual identity verification.

Amazon Rekognition is a
quick and cost effective way
for you to implement easy to use
and customizable face detection,

search and comparison
APIs into your process.
Grow your users faster, reduce fraud
and lower identity verification costs
with Amazon Rekognition.
